Build src snippet for Nix derivation

Source: R/derivs.R
build_src_snippet.Rd

Build src snippet for Nix derivation

Usage

build_src_snippet(fileset_parts)

Arguments

fileset_parts

Character vector of files to include

Value

String with src snippet or empty string
